desc: Accepted on 50+ airlines! This award-winning travel accessory takes the stress out of flying with your baby, toddler or children by creating a space for them to sleep and play on their airplane seat. Review: Great alternative to a car seat on the airplane or to Plane Pal, and Stokke Jet Kids Bedbox! Fly away Kids Bed..

layout.text:
Helping kids sleep and
play on planes
